fr.flowarg.flowupdater.integrations

Class Integration

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.flowarg.flowupdater.integrations.Integration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CurseForgeIntegration, OptiFineIntegration

    public abstract class Integration
extends java.lang.Object
    The new Integration system replaces old plugin system which had some problems such as unavailability to communicate directly with FlowUpdater. This new system is more easy to use: no more annoying updater's options, no more extra-dependencies. Polymorphism and inheritance can now be used to avoid code duplication.
